message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my assessment of the product's value, I am willing to pay $12000 for it. I hope this proposal works for you.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to get closer to $13000. How about we split the difference and settle on $12500?  This would give us both a fair deal.
